title.rendered: Everts Air Cargo Head Office: Ticket Booking and Fleet

content.rendered:
Everts Air Cargo is an American Part 121 airline based in Fairbanks, Alaska, USA. It operates D.O.D, scheduled and charter airline cargo within Alaska, Canada, Mexico and continental US Its Maintenance base is Fairbanks International Airport with its major cargo hub at Ted Stevens Anchorage International Airport.

 

 

Anchorage

6111 Lockheed Avenue
Anchorage, AK 99502

Phone : Telephone : 907-243-0009

Toll Free : 866-242-0009

Business hours : Monday – Friday – 7:00 AM – 9:00 PM, Saturday – 8:30 AM – 5:00 PM, Closed Sunday

Fairbank

5525 Airport Industrial Road
Fairbanks, AK 99709

Phone : Telephone : 907-450-2300

Toll Free : 800-434-3488

Passenger Reservations 907-450-2351

Passenger Flight Status Hotline 907-450-2352

Business hours : Monday – Friday – 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM, Closed Saturday & Sunday
Booking

Everts Air Cargo  Official website :  https://evertsair.com/

Queries handled by Everts Air Cargo Customer care:

Schedule, eBooking, Rescheduling, Track and Trace, Charter Service Queries, Trucking service Queries, e-claims Flight Information, Missing Luggage, Delayed Flights. Pharma, pets, valuable, perishable goods and extra care shipment queries.

Is there any problem / complaint with reaching the Everts Air Cargo Address or Phone number? Please report any issues using the below comment form.

Rate your experience with the Everts Air Cargo : (click on the stars below)
